Great Master Sigmund:
Unfortunately, You've came all this way for the sake of the benefactor. He's not here. And find it will not be easy. No one knows where he is.
I heard that he came here and was looking for something but don't know where he went next. If You really want to find him, go to the Forge and talk to the Chief Blacksmith Lambert. He is proud to be guarded of Kain van Halter when he was little. Don't know if that's true, but he says that him and the sword forged.
